items.title: Anker 160W Prime wall charger with touch/app-control, Smart Display, more hits one of its lowest prices at $106
items.summary:

Aventon continues to offer its three most popular legacy e-bikes with up to $500 savings, one of which is the Level 2 Commuter e-bike at $1,499 shipped. Normally priced at $1,899 without discounts, it’s more often been found keeping down around $1,599 over the last year, especially once tariffs ramped up in early 2025, with things since only having gone as low as $1,499. The $400 markdown here is continuing from its November and December holiday sale for the best price of the last year, as Aventon is likely clearing stock to make way for all its newest smart e-bikes that were released across 2025, as well as the new Soltera 3 ADV that just hit the market. items.summary:

You can now prep to score Navimow’s new flagship X4 series (either the X430 or X450 robot lawn mowers) with a $200 deposit, or the i2 AWD series (i206 or i210 robot lawn mowers) with a $100 deposit. Putting down your deposits before the official launch on February 13 gives you a coupon code for 10% savings that you can use then, as well as 1-year extended support, and a 36-piece blade kit ($72 value), while the i2 AWD robots also get a free Garage S add-on for the charging station ($200 value).

Drift off to sleep caressed by the shining beauty of the universe with this night light projector that comes in the form of an adorable astronaut, with a magnetically connected head that can be adjusted to fill whatever space its placed in, as well as a removable moon base and a posable arm.
